- Add missing @radix-ui/number dependency required by @radix-ui/react-select
- Verify build works locally before push

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix(lint): resolve ESLint errors in test files

- Replace require() imports with ES6 imports in test mocks
- Remove unused React imports from mock components
- Fix unused variable in TripsListClient.test.tsx
- Use createElement from react instead of require(''react'')

Remaining warnings for ''any'' types are acceptable and can be addressed separately.
